title: Blizzard Staff
summaries: The Blizzard Staff is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that rains damaging, non-piercing icicles from above which are directed in the general location of the cursor. The Blizzard Staff is dropped from the Ice Queen during the Frost Moon event with a 4.44% ~ 7.78% (15.56% ~ 31.11%) chance depending on the current wave.
By default, the Blizzard Staff shoots 4 icicles per use. <linked>Modifiers</linked> that boost speed by 10% or more will make it shoot 6 icicles per use.

statistics.Sell: 9 GC
